general_advisory: Farmers are advised to avoid exposure outside during the peak heat hours of the day. Start sowing kharif crops when the monsoon gives a cumulative rainfall of more than 70 mm.

advisory: Harvest the crop at maturity stage. Avoid harvesting at over maturity stage as the pods will be shattered.
Due to temperature effect in brinjal, Foot & Shoot borer can be managed by application of Neem based pesticides 330 ppm. Also due to weather, there may be an attack of Mites.
Prepare a well-cultivated dry bed of size 10 decimal of land required for acre of paddy transplantation.
Choose good varieties like Arjuna, Kalua, Sriprava.
After getting good rainfall, prepare the land and sow the ragi seeds behind the plough.
Choose good varieties like Kalinga Maize, Prabal, etc.
Spacing is 60x30 cm.
Apply the basal dose of 8:16:16 kg NPK/acre after final land preparation.
Choose good varieties like Dharani, Smruti, Kadri-6, Kalinga groundnut.
Treat the seeds with Vitavax power.
One hour before sowing treat with Rhizobium culture.
Apply 2 t FYM, 1q gypsum along with 8:16:16 kg NPK/acre.
Spacing is 30x10 cm.
Collect good quality ginger Rhizomes namely Suprava, Suruchi, Suravi.
Seed rate is 6-8 q/ac.
Each piece should be 20g and contain 2-3 eyes.
Treat the seeds before planting in the field.
Sow good varieties like Roma, Suroma, Ranga, and Rashmi.
Seed rate is 8-10 q/ac.
The seed material should contain 2-3 eyes and of 20-25g per piece.
